Title: Lark Rise to Candleford
Actors: Olivia Hallinan, Julia Sawalha, Brendan Coyle, Claudie Blakley, Dawn French, Ben Miles, John Dagleish, Jason Merrells, Ruby Bentall, Linda Bassett, Karl Johnson, Mark Heap, Victoria Hamilton, Matilda Ziegler, Ben Aldridge, Matthew McNulty, Sarah Lancashire
Plot: An adaptation of Flora Thompson's autobiographical novel "Lark Rise To Candleford", set in 19 century Oxfordshire, in which a young girl moves to the local market town to begin an apprenticeship as a postmistress.
